text: Remember to take breaks when you need, Emily. Your well-being is the most important. How about we plan a short walk during our lunch break? Fresh air could be really rejuvenating for you.

You're doing amazing with your contributions to the team, Emily. The client was really impressed with your last presentation. Maybe you could share your preparation process with the team? It could become a part of our best practices.
Let's catch up over coffee tomorrow morning, say 8 am? The usual spot. We can talk about how you're managing your workload and discuss any adjustments we can make.
You've been handling the stress so well, Emily. Proud of you! Have you continued with your journaling in the evenings? It might be good to reflect on your successes each day.
